channel.title: CVE Feed for M-Files -- M-Files Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for M-Files -- M-Files Server

item.title: CVE-2022-4858|2024-08-03T01:55:45.993Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log Files in M-Files Server before 22.10.11846.0 could allow to obtain sensitive tokens from logs, if specific configurations were set.

item.title: CVE-2022-1606|2024-08-03T00:10:03.558Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description: Incorrect privilege assignment in M-Files Server versions before 22.3.11164.0 and before 22.3.11237.1 allows user to read unmanaged objects.

item.title: CVE-2022-1911|2024-08-03T00:17:00.947Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description: Error in parser function in M-Files Server versions before 22.6.11534.1 and before 22.6.11505.0 allowed unauthenticated access to some information of the underlying operating system.
